name: com.harinesh.ide.void
description: Enhanced Void editor integration for Unity. Modified from VSCode integration to work with Void editor, a powerful fork of VSCode. This package adds support for generating csproj files, intellisense, debugging, auto-discovery of installations, and seamless Unity project integration. Original Cursor integration by boxqkrtm.

_upm.changelog:
Integration:

- Add support for Void editor
- Modified by Harinesh
- Based on Cursor integration by boxqkrtm and original VSCode integration by Microsoft
